column1: '''The One Ring Celebration''' or '''ORC''' was an annual event hosted from 2005 to 2007 by [http://www.theonering.net TheOneRing.net] and [http://www.creationent.com/ Creation Entertainment]. The first convention was held on January 14-16
*[http://www.theonering.net/torwp/2006/11/28/900-the-one-ring-celebration-2007-officially-announced/ The One Ring Celebration 2007 Officially Announced] (TheOneRing.net).
*[http://scrapbook.theonering.net/scrapbook/group/1611/ ORC: The One Ring Celebration Gallery II] (TheOneRing.net).
